name: Up in Arms
description: Carlos Yturria at Cafe Claude Marina in San Francisco whips up this cocktail to remind you of a stroll along the Seine. Fresh lemon adds focus to the fruity, rich Lillet, while Bonal, a bitter aperitif wine, brings it all into balance.

recipeInstructions.text: Add Lillet Rouge, Bonal, and lemon juice to a mixing glass. Fill with ice and stir until well chilled, about 30 seconds. Strain into a coupe glass and serve, garnished with an orange twist.
